summary.span: 實作 AL 工作。

span.span: Implements the AL task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 AL 元素，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the AL element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [AL (組件連結器) 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2ddefbf2-5662-4d55-99a6-ac383bf44560)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [AL (Assembly Linker) Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2ddefbf2-5662-4d55-99a6-ac383bf44560).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlgorithmId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlgorithmId : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定雜湊多檔案組件中所有檔案的演算法，但包含組件資訊清單的檔案除外。

span.span: Gets or sets an algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

value.span: 雜湊多檔案組件中所有檔案的演算法，但包含組件資訊清單的檔案除外。

span.span: The algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/algid` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/algid` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseAddress { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseAddress : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在執行階段將 DLL 載入使用者電腦上的位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user's computer at run time.

value.span: 在 DLL 載入使用者的電腦執行階段位址。

span.span: The address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user's computer at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您指定 DLL 的基底位址，而不是讓作業系統重新找出處理序空間中的 DLL，應用程式載入的速度會更快。Applications load faster if you specify the base address of the DLLs, rather than letting the operating system relocate the DLLs in the process space. 這個屬性會對應至中的 /base [address] 選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the /base[address] option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

member this.DelaySign : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值表示僅將公開金鑰放在組件中 () 還是完整簽署組件 ()。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to place only the public key in the assembly () or to fully sign the assembly ().

value.span: 如果僅將公開金鑰放在組件中，則為 ，如果完整簽署組件，則為 。

span.span: if only the public key is placed in the assembly; if the assembly is fully signed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/delay[sign]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/delay[sign]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/descr[iption]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/descr[iption]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ EmbedResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.EmbedResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要內嵌在含有組件資訊清單之影像中的資源。

span.span: Gets or sets the resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

value.span: 要內嵌在含有組件資訊清單之影像中的資源。

span.span: The resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工作會將資源檔的內容複製到映像。This task copies the contents of the resource file into the image. 這個屬性中設定的項目可能具有附加至它們呼叫的選擇性中繼資料`LogicalName`和`Access`。The items set in this property may have optional metadata attached to them called `LogicalName` and `Access`. `LogicalName` 中繼資料可用來指定資源的內部識別項。The `LogicalName` metadata is used to specify the internal identifier for the resource. 您可以將 `Access` 中繼資料設為 `private`，以便讓其他組件無法看見資源。The `Access` metadata can be set to `private` in order to make the resource not visible to other assemblies. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/embed[resource]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/embed[resource]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EvidenceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EvidenceFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要以 Security.Evidence 的資源名稱內嵌在組件中的檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets the file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

value.span: 若要內嵌的資源名稱的組件中的檔案Security.Evidence。

span.span: The file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Security.Evidence` 無法用於一般資源。You cannot use `Security.Evidence` for regular resources. 此屬性會對應至`/e[vidence]`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/e[vidence]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

member this.GenerateFullPaths : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指出是否要讓工作對錯誤訊息中回報的任何檔案使用絕對路徑。

value.span: 如果工作將針對錯誤訊息中回報的所有檔案使用絕對路徑，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the task will use the absolute path for any files that are reported in an error message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`/fullpaths`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/fullpaths` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

Protected Overrides Function GenerateFullPathToTool () As String

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyContainer { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyContainer : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定保留金鑰組的容器。

span.span: Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.

value.span: 保留金鑰組的容器。

span.span: The container that holds a key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這樣會藉由將公開金鑰插入組件資訊清單中的方式簽署組件 (為它指定強式名稱)。This will sign the assembly (give it a strong name) by inserting a public key into the assembly manifest. 工作接著將使用私密金鑰來簽署最終組件。The task will then sign the final assembly with the private key. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/keyn[ame]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/keyn[ame]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定檔案，這個檔案包含金鑰組或只包含公開金鑰來簽署組件。

span.span: Gets or sets a file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

value.span: 包含金鑰組或只包含公開金鑰來簽署組件的檔案。

span.span: The file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編譯器會將公開金鑰插入組件資訊清單中，然後使用私密金鑰簽署最終組件。The compiler inserts the public key in the assembly manifest and then signs the final assembly with the private key. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/keyf[ile]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/keyf[ile]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ LinkResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.LinkResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要連結至組件的資源檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the resource files to link to an assembly.

value.span: 要連結至組件的資源檔。

span.span: The resource files to link to an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源會變成組件的一部分，但不會複製檔案。The resource becomes part of the assembly, but the file is not copied. 傳遞給這個參數的項目可能具有已附加到它們的選擇性中繼資料，稱為 `LogicalName`、`Target` 及 `Access`。The items passed in to this parameter may have optional metadata attached to them called `LogicalName`, `Target`, and `Access`. `LogicalName` 中繼資料可用來指定資源的內部識別項。The `LogicalName` metadata is used to specify the internal identifier for the resource. `Target` 中繼資料可以指定工作要將檔案複製到其中的路徑和檔案名稱，之後它會將這個新檔案編譯成組件。The `Target` metadata can specify the path and filename to which the task copies the file, after which it compiles this new file into the assembly. 您可以將 `Access` 中繼資料設為 `private`，以便讓其他組件無法看見資源。The `Access` metadata can be set to `private` in order to make the resource not visible to other assemblies. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/link[resource]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/link[resource]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MainEntryPoint { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MainEntryPoint : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定將模組轉換成可執行檔時，用來作為進入點之方法的完整名稱 (*class.method*)。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

value.span: 完整格式的名稱 (*class.method*) 要將模組轉換為可執行檔時，做為進入點使用的方法。

span.span: The fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`/main`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/main` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

member this.Platform : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，限制可以執行這個程式碼的平台，必須為下列其中一個值：x86、Itanium、x64 或 anycpu。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

value.span: 字串，限制哪些平台上;，可以執行此程式碼必須是其中一個x86， Itanium， x64，或anycpu。

span.span: A string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 `anycpu`。The default is `anycpu`. 此屬性會對應至`/platform`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/platform` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

member this.SdkToolsPath : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 SDK 工具的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the SDK tools.

value.span: SDK 工具路徑。

span.span: The path to the SDK tools.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ SourceModules { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.SourceModules : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要編譯至組件中的模組。

span.span: Gets or sets the modules to be compiled into an assembly.

value.span: 要編譯至組件中的模組。

span.span: The modules to be compiled into an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模組將列在所產生組件的資訊清單中，且仍需依序散發和提供，才能載入組件。The modules will be listed in the manifest of the resulting assembly, and will still need to distributed and available in order for the assembly to load. 傳遞到此參數的項目可能具有名為 `Target` 的其他中繼資料，以指定工作要將檔案複製到其中的路徑和檔案名稱，之後它會將這個新檔案編譯成組件。The items passed into this parameter may have additional metadata called `Target`, which specifies the path and filename to which the task copies the file, after which it compiles this new file into the assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md). 這個屬性會對應到不含特定參數傳遞至 Al.exe 的模組清單。This property corresponds to the list of modules passed into Al.exe without a specific switch.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetType : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定輸出檔的檔案格式：library (程式碼程式庫)、exe (主控台應用程式) 或 win (Windows 應用程式)。

span.span: Gets or sets the file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

value.span: 輸出檔的檔案格式：程式庫（程式碼程式庫）， exe （主控台應用程式） 或贏得（以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式）。

span.span: The file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 `library`。The default is `library`. 此屬性會對應至`/t[arget]`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/t[arget]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TemplateFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TemplateFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要從其中繼承所有組件中繼資料的組件，但不包括文化特性欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

value.span: 要從其中繼承所有組件中繼資料的組件，但不包括文化特性欄位。

span.span: The assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的組件必須具有強式名稱。The specified assembly must have a strong name. 使用 `TemplateFile` 參數建立的組件會是附屬組件。An assembly that you create with the `TemplateFile` parameter will be a satellite assembly. 此屬性會對應至`/template`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/template` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定組件中的 Title 欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the Title field in the assembly.

value.span: Title組件中的欄位。

span.span: The Title field in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/title` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/title` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

summary.span: 取得工具的名稱 (Al.exe)。

span.span: Gets the name of the tool (Al.exe).

value.span: 工具的名稱。

span.span: The name of the tool.

member this.Trademark : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定組件中的 Trademark 欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the Trademark field in the assembly.

value.span: 商標組件中的欄位。

span.span: The Trademark field in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/trade[mark]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/trade[mark]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

member this.Version : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個組件的版本資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the version information for this assembly.

value.span: 這個組件的版本資訊。

span.span: The version information for this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串格式是 *major.minor.build.revision*。The format of the string is *major.minor.build.revision*. 預設值為 0。The default value is 0. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/v[ersion]` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/v[ersion]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Icon { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Win32Icon : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要插入組件的 .ico 檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets the .ico file to insert in the assembly.

value.span: 要插入組件的 .ico 檔案。

span.span: The .ico file to insert in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Ico 檔案會讓輸出檔在 Windows 檔案總管中所需的外觀。The .ico file gives the output file the desired appearance in Windows Explorer. 此屬性會對應至`/win32icon`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/win32icon` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Resource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Win32Resource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要插入輸出檔中的 Win32 資源 (.res 檔案)。

span.span: Gets or sets a Win32 resource (.res file) to insert in the output file.

value.span: 要插入輸出檔中的 Win32 資源 (.res 檔案)。

span.span: The Win32 resource (.res file) to insert in the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/win32res` 選項的說明文件。For more information, see the documentation for the `/win32res` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).
